arts.ttl: Oldham stun York to reach National League promotion final
arts.sum: Second-half goals from Vimal Yoganathan and Joe Pritchard sealed Latics’ victory.

arts.ttl: Play-Off Semi Final Preview: York City v Oldham Athletic
arts.sum: For York City the wait is nearly only but for Oldham Athletic, it’s all about carrying on where they left off last week. Adam Hinshelwood, York City: “We’ve got one home game to get to Wembley, and how many times do you get that opportunity in your career?

arts.ttl: Preview: York City vs. Oldham Athletic - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's National League clash between York City and Oldham Athletic, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
